name: Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
directions: 2. In large bowl, mash bananas with fork. Add shortening, eggs, sugar, and vanilla. Blend well.
3. In separate medium bowl, mix together flour, baking powder, and salt.
4. Slowly pour and stir flour mixture into banana mixture.
6. Grease inside of 9 x 5-inch loaf pan. Scrape batter into pan and bake for about 50 minutes or until a knife (or toothpick) inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Remove loaf from oven and let set for 15 minutes until turning loaf out onto rack to cool.
